channel.title: Hindustan Times | Facebook RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an RSS feed of the three most recent posts at https://www.facebook.com/hindustantimes

item.title: #Crickit | Former India bowlin
item.description: #Crickit | Former India bowling coach Paras Mhambrey explains #UmranMalik's dramatic fall (via CrickIt)

item.title: #KanganaRanaut says the indust
item.description: #KanganaRanaut says the industry is filled with people who are ‘envious and venomous’

item.title: #Uttarakhand CM #PushkarSinghD
item.description: #Uttarakhand CM #PushkarSinghDhami announces a big push on jobs and education, distributing appointment letters to 72 new Assistant Professors and launching a portal offering Rs 50,000 grants for meritorious students.
